description: Document model for defining resource templates - the product-level configuration for service offerings. Contains core product information, target audiences, facet configurations, and service definitions that can be commercialized via Service Offerings.
name: ResourceTemplate

modules.description: Operations for managing resource template metadata
modules.name: Template Management

operations.description: Updates template title, summary, description and links
operations.name: UPDATE_TEMPLATE_INFO
operations.schema:
input UpdateTemplateInfoInput {
    title: String
    summary: String
    description: String
    thumbnailUrl: URL
    infoLink: URL
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Updates the template status
operations.name: UPDATE_TEMPLATE_STATUS
operations.reducer:
state.status = action.input.status;
state.lastModified = action.input.lastModified;

operations.description: Sets the operator for this template
operations.name: SET_OPERATOR
operations.reducer:
state.operatorId = action.input.operatorId;
state.lastModified = action.input.lastModified;
operations.template: Sets the operator for this template

operations.description: Sets the template identifier
operations.name: SET_TEMPLATE_ID
operations.reducer:
state.id = action.input.id;
state.lastModified = action.input.lastModified;

operations.description: Adds a target audience

errors.description: An audience with this ID already exists
errors.name: DuplicateAudienceIdError

operations.name: ADD_TARGET_AUDIENCE

operations.description: Removes a target audience

errors.description: Audience with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: AudienceNotFoundError

operations.name: REMOVE_TARGET_AUDIENCE

operations.description: Sets or updates a facet target configuration
operations.name: SET_FACET_TARGET
operations.schema:
input SetFacetTargetInput {
    id: OID!
    categoryKey: String!
    categoryLabel: String!
    selectedOptions: [String!]!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Removes a facet target configuration

errors.description: Facet target with the specified category key does not exist
errors.name: FacetTargetNotFoundError

operations.name: REMOVE_FACET_TARGET

operations.description: Adds an option to a facet target

errors.description: Facet target with the specified category key does not exist
errors.name: AddFacetOptionTargetNotFoundError

operations.name: ADD_FACET_OPTION
operations.template: Adds an option to a facet target

operations.description: Removes an option from a facet target

errors.description: Facet target with the specified category key does not exist
errors.name: RemoveFacetOptionTargetNotFoundError

operations.name: REMOVE_FACET_OPTION
operations.template: Removes an option from a facet target

operations.description: Sets the setup service category labels
operations.name: SET_SETUP_SERVICES
operations.reducer:
state.setupServices = action.input.services;
state.lastModified = action.input.lastModified;

operations.description: Sets the recurring service category labels
operations.name: SET_RECURRING_SERVICES
operations.reducer:
state.recurringServices = action.input.services;
state.lastModified = action.input.lastModified;

modules.description: Operations for managing services in the template
modules.name: Service Management

operations.description: Adds a new service to the template

errors.description: A service with this ID already exists
errors.name: DuplicateServiceIdError

operations.name: ADD_SERVICE
operations.schema:
input AddServiceInput {
    id: OID!
    title: String!
    description: String
    parentServiceId: OID
    displayOrder: Int
    isSetupFormation: Boolean
    optionGroupId: OID
    lastModified: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Adds a new service to the template

operations.description: Updates an existing service

errors.description: Service with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: UpdateServiceNotFoundError

operations.name: UPDATE_SERVICE
operations.schema:
input UpdateServiceInput {
    id: OID!
    title: String
    description: String
    parentServiceId: OID
    displayOrder: Int
    isSetupFormation: Boolean
    optionGroupId: OID
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Removes a service from the template

errors.description: Service with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: DeleteServiceNotFoundError

operations.name: DELETE_SERVICE
operations.template: Removes a service from the template

operations.description: Adds a facet binding to a service

errors.description: Service with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: AddFacetServiceNotFoundError

errors.description: A facet binding with this ID already exists
errors.name: DuplicateBindingIdError

operations.name: ADD_FACET_BINDING
operations.schema:
input AddFacetBindingInput {
    serviceId: OID!
    bindingId: OID!
    facetName: String!
    facetType: PHID!
    supportedOptions: [OID!]!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Adds a facet binding to a service

operations.description: Removes a facet binding from a service

errors.description: Service with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: RemoveFacetServiceNotFoundError

errors.description: Facet binding with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: BindingNotFoundError

operations.name: REMOVE_FACET_BINDING
operations.template: Removes a facet binding from a service

operations.description: Adds a new option group

errors.description: An option group with this ID already exists
errors.name: DuplicateOptionGroupIdError

operations.name: ADD_OPTION_GROUP
operations.schema:
input AddOptionGroupInput {
    id: OID!
    name: String!
    description: String
    isAddOn: Boolean!
    defaultSelected: Boolean!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Updates an existing option group

errors.description: Option group with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: UpdateOptionGroupNotFoundError

operations.name: UPDATE_OPTION_GROUP
operations.schema:
input UpdateOptionGroupInput {
    id: OID!
    name: String
    description: String
    isAddOn: Boolean
    defaultSelected: Boolean
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Removes an option group from the template

errors.description: Option group with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: DeleteOptionGroupNotFoundError

operations.name: DELETE_OPTION_GROUP
operations.template: Removes an option group from the template

operations.name: ADD_FAQ
UPDATE_FAQ
DELETE_FAQ

operations.description: Reorders FAQ items by updating their display order
operations.name: REORDER_FAQS
operations.template: Reorders FAQ items by updating their display order

modules.description: Operations for managing expandable content sections for long-form article content
modules.name: Content Section Management

operations.description: Adds a new expandable content section
operations.name: ADD_CONTENT_SECTION
operations.schema:
input AddContentSectionInput {
    id: OID!
    title: String!
    content: String!
    displayOrder: Int!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Adds a new expandable content section

operations.description: Updates an existing content section
operations.name: UPDATE_CONTENT_SECTION
operations.schema:
input UpdateContentSectionInput {
    id: OID!
    title: String
    content: String
    displayOrder: Int
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

operations.description: Removes a content section
operations.name: DELETE_CONTENT_SECTION

operations.description: Reorders content sections by updating their display order
operations.name: REORDER_CONTENT_SECTIONS
operations.template: Reorders content sections by updating their display order

global.schema:
type ResourceTemplateState {
    id: PHID!
    operatorId: PHID!
    title: String!
    summary: String!
    description: String
    thumbnailUrl: URL
    infoLink: URL
    status: TemplateStatus!
    lastModified: DateTime!
    targetAudiences: [TargetAudience!]!
    setupServices: [String!]!
    recurringServices: [String!]!
    facetTargets: [FacetTarget!]!
    services: [Service!]!
    optionGroups: [OptionGroup!]!
    faqFields: [FaqField!]
    contentSections: [ContentSection!]!
}

enum TemplateStatus {
    DRAFT
    COMING_SOON
    ACTIVE
    DEPRECATED
}

type TargetAudience {
    id: OID!
    label: String!
    color: String
}

type FacetTarget {
    id: OID!
    categoryKey: String!
    categoryLabel: String!
    selectedOptions: [String!]!
}

type Service {
    id: OID!
    title: String!
    description: String
    displayOrder: Int
    parentServiceId: OID
    isSetupFormation: Boolean!
    optionGroupId: OID
    facetBindings: [ResourceFacetBinding!]!
}

type ResourceFacetBinding {
    id: OID!
    facetName: String!
    facetType: PHID!
    supportedOptions: [OID!]!
}

type OptionGroup {
    id: OID!
    name: String!
    description: String
    isAddOn: Boolean!
    defaultSelected: Boolean!
}

type FaqField {
    id: OID!
    question: String
    answer: String
    displayOrder: Int!
}

type ContentSection {
    id: OID!
    title: String!
    content: String!
    displayOrder: Int!
}
